original_text: But I was not happy in my thoughts because I could not find my friend Titus there. So I said ‘goodbye’ to those people and I travelled on to Macedonia.
korean_text: 내가 내 형제 디도를 만나지 못하므로 내 심령이 편하지 못하여 그들을 작별하고 마게도냐로 갔노라

sentences.original_text: But I was not happy in my thoughts
because I could not find my friend Titus there
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그곳에서 내 친구 디도를 찾을 수 없었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: So I said 'goodbye' to those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 그 사람들에게 '작별 인사'를 했습니다

sentences.original_text: and I travelled on to Macedonia
